```py
import lists as L

data Pair: p(hd, ref tl) end

p0 = p(0, 0)
p1 = p(1, 1)

p2 = p(2, 3)
p3 = p(3, 4)
p2!{tl: p3}
p3!{tl: p2}

p4 = p(4, p3)
p5 = p(5, p4)

p6 = p(6, "dummy")
p6!{tl: p6}
```

```py
data Pair: p(hd :: Number, ref tl :: Option<Pair>) end
```

```py
p0 = p(0, none)
p1 = p(1, none)

p2 = p(2, none)
p3 = p(3, none)
p2!{tl: some(p3)}
p3!{tl: some(p2)}
p4 = p(4, some(p3))
p5 = p(5, some(p4))

p6 = p(6, none)
p6!{tl: some(p6)}
```

```py
cc :: Pair -> Boolean
```

```py
fun cc(e):
  fun loop(cur, hist):
    if is-p(cur):
      if L.member-identical(hist, cur):
        true
      else:
        loop(cur!tl, link(cur, hist))
      end
    else:
      false
    end
  end
  loop(e, empty)
end
```

```py
check:
  cc(p0) is false
  cc(p1) is false
  cc(p2) is true
  cc(p3) is true
  cc(p4) is true
  cc(p5) is true
  cc(p6) is true
end
```

```py
check:
  p0 violates cc
  p2 satisfies cc
end
```

```py
fun th(e):
  fun loop(tt, hr):
    if tt <=> hr:
      true
    else:
      if is-p(tt) and is-p(hr):
        new-tt = tt!tl
        int-hr = hr!tl
        if is-p(int-hr):
          new-hr = int-hr!tl
          loop(new-tt, new-hr)
        else:
          false
        end
      else:
        false
      end
    end
  end
  loop(e, e!tl)
end
```

```py
check:
  cc(p0) is false
  cc(p2) is true
end
```

```py
check:
  cc(p0) is th(p0)
  cc(p1) is th(p1)
  cc(p2) is th(p2)
  cc(p3) is th(p3)
  cc(p4) is th(p4)
  cc(p5) is th(p5)
  cc(p6) is th(p6)
end
```

```py
import lists as L

data Pair: p(hd, ref tl) end

p0 = p(0, 0)
p1 = p(1, 1)

p2 = p(2, 3)
p3 = p(3, 4)
p2!{tl: p3}
p3!{tl: p2}

p4 = p(4, p3)
p5 = p(5, p4)

p6 = p(6, "dummy")
p6!{tl: p6}
```

```py
data Pair: p(hd :: Number, ref tl :: Option<Pair>) end
```

```py
p0 = p(0, none)
p1 = p(1, none)

p2 = p(2, none)
p3 = p(3, none)
p2!{tl: some(p3)}
p3!{tl: some(p2)}
p4 = p(4, some(p3))
p5 = p(5, some(p4))

p6 = p(6, none)
p6!{tl: some(p6)}
```

```py
cc :: Pair -> Boolean
```

```py
fun cc(e):
  fun loop(cur, hist):
    if is-p(cur):
      if L.member-identical(hist, cur):
        true
      else:
        loop(cur!tl, link(cur, hist))
      end
    else:
      false
    end
  end
  loop(e, empty)
end
```

```py
check:
  cc(p0) is false
  cc(p1) is false
  cc(p2) is true
  cc(p3) is true
  cc(p4) is true
  cc(p5) is true
  cc(p6) is true
end
```

```py
check:
  p0 violates cc
  p2 satisfies cc
end
```

```py
fun th(e):
  fun loop(tt, hr):
    if tt <=> hr:
      true
    else:
      if is-p(tt) and is-p(hr):
        new-tt = tt!tl
        int-hr = hr!tl
        if is-p(int-hr):
          new-hr = int-hr!tl
          loop(new-tt, new-hr)
        else:
          false
        end
      else:
        false
      end
    end
  end
  loop(e, e!tl)
end
```

```py
check:
  cc(p0) is false
  cc(p2) is true
end
```

```py
check:
  cc(p0) is th(p0)
  cc(p1) is th(p1)
  cc(p2) is th(p2)
  cc(p3) is th(p3)
  cc(p4) is th(p4)
  cc(p5) is th(p5)
  cc(p6) is th(p6)
end
```
